div.bibl: Saloniki, Dec. 18, 1926. ELECTIONS OF OFFICERS OF GREEK AMERICAN LEGION.

body.p: The Chapter 343 of the Greek American Legion has elected as new officers:

D. A. Tasiopoulos, Commander; N. Conglis, Sr. Vice-Commander; L. Verdos, 1st. Jr. Vice-Commander; N. Cachavos, 2nd Jr. Vice-Commander; Th. Michacopoulos, Finance Officer; P. Stavropoulos, Chaplain; Gus Polos, Sergeant at Arms; James Papas, Athletic Official; D. Delvois, Auditor; P. Mechales, Historian; C. Koursoumis, Medical Offical; A. A. Pantelis, Publicity; J. Dayiantis, Service Official.
